TextView.android:text: 1. Indicate ALL repair and estimating software you use.
Rank (1-5) from most to least software usage.
2. What repair order writing software you use?
3. What version of repair order writing software selected above you are using?
4. When was the repair order writing software purchased? Year:
5. How much did you spend on the repair order writing software?
6. Does your repair order writing software have recurring monthly charges or one-time fee?
7. Do you use shop management software different from your repair order writing software?
If 'Yes', what shop management software you use?
When was the software purchased? Year:
8. List ALL parts houses/suppliers where you buy parts
9. How do you order your parts ?
Rank (1-5) from most to least how you order your parts.
